CWEs: CWE-116: Improper Encoding or Escaping of Output
description: The function is vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) due to the use of regular expressions with user-controlled input. This can lead to excessive consumption of CPU resources. The function is also vulnerable to Prototype Pollution as it directly assigns user-controlled input to object properties. This can lead to unintended property modifications and potentially arbitrary code execution.
